long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension exports performance information into a local database (persistent file, that accessible from your file system).

Icon design by http://mediadesign.deviantart.com.

Source code available at https://github.com/alipov/PerfTimingExporter

I wrote a blogpost about this extension: http://blog.osom.info/2013/07/exporting-google-chromes-page-load.html
